unit.name: Lord of Excess
unit.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly SLAANESH INFANTRY units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

unit.name: Excessive Vigour (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly SLAANESH unit is within 6" of this model, if that unit made a Charge move this turn, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.

unit.name: Ecstatic Death
unit.description: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. This model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Slaanesh This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

name: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh with Wings

unit.name: Daemonic Destruction
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6 for each of this model’s remaining wounds: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

unit.name: Stimulated by Pain
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Slaanesh with Wings This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

unit.name: Daemonic Poisons
unit.description: In your Shooting phase and the Fight phase , after this model has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the battle, that enemy unit is poisoned. At the start of each player’s Command phase , roll one D6 for each poisoned enemy unit on the battlefield: on a 4+,that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds .

unit.name: Daemon Primarch of Slaanesh
unit.description: At the start of your opponent’s Command phase , select one of the abilities in the Daemon Primarch of Slaanesh section. Until the start of your opponent’s next Command phase, this model has that ability.

unit.name: Serpentine
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move , it can move over sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height.

composition.description: 1 Fulgrim – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: malefic lash; daemonic blades; serpentine tail.

unit.name: Daemon Lord of Slaanesh (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly LEGIONS OF EXCESS unit is within 6" of this model, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.

unit.name: Mesmerising Form
unit.description: Each time an attack targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

unit.name: Shining Aegis
unit.description: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 3+.

composition.description: 1 Keeper of Secrets This model is equipped with: Phantasmagoria; snapping claws; witstealer sword.

unit.name: Perfectionists
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Euphoric Strikes
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1.

composition.description: 1 Lord Exultant This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; plasma pistol; Phoenix power spear; close combat weapon.

leader.name: Perfectionists
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Obsessive Annunciation
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

unit.name: Doom Siren
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model’s unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks and roll three D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound . If an enemy unit suffers one or more mortal wounds as a result of this ability, it must take a Battle-shock test .

composition.description: 1 Lord Kakophonist This model is equipped with: screamer pistol; power sword.

leader.name: Obsessive Annunciation
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

unit.name: A Challenge Worthy of Skill
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER , MONSTER or WALKER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .

unit.name: Duellist’s Hubris
unit.description: At the start of the Fight phase ; if this model is not leading a unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Fights First ability.

composition.description: 1 Lucius the Eternal – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Blade of the Laer; Lash of Torment.

unit.name: No Prey Can Evade
unit.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this model.

unit.name: Monarch of the Hunt
unit.description: At the start of the first battle round , select one enemy unit to be this model’s quarry. Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets its quarry, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll . Each time this model’s quarry is destroyed, select one new enemy unit to be this model’s quarry.

composition.description: 1 Shalaxi Helbane – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: lash of Slaanesh; Pavane of Slaanesh; snapping claws; Soulpiercer.

unit.name: Warped Interference (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in it have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Wracking Agonies (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with its Agonising Energies. Until the start of your next turn, that unit is wracked with agonies. While a unit is wracked with agonies, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

composition.description: 1 Sorcerer This model is equipped with: Agonising Energies; bolt pistol; force weapon.

leader.name: Warped Interference (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in it have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Horrifying Beauty
unit.description: At the start of the Fight phase , each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 1 from the result if that enemy unit is Below Half-strength .

unit.name: Daemonic Icon
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

unit.name: Instrument of Chaos
unit.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

composition.description: 1 Alluress 9 Daemonettes Every model is equipped with: slashing claws.

unit.name: Excessive Assault
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit targets an enemy unit with a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

unit.name: Icon of Excess
unit.description: At the end of your Shooting phase or the Fight phase , if the bearer’s unit destroyed one or more enemy units that phase, the bearer’s unit takes a Leadership test . If that test is passed, you gain 1CP.

composition.description: 1 Obsessionist 4-9 Infractors The Obsessionist is equipped with: bolt pistol; power sword. Every Infractor is equipped with: bolt pistol; duelling sabre.

unit.name: Objective Defiled
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

unit.name: Icon of Excess
unit.description: At the end of your Shooting phase or the Fight phase , if the bearer’s unit destroyed one or more enemy units that phase, the bearer’s unit takes a Leadership test . If that test is passed, you gain 1CP.

composition.description: 1 Obsessionist 4-9 Tormentors The Obsessionist is equipped with: bolt pistol; power sword. Every Tormentor is equipped with: boltgun; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Assault Vehicle
unit.description: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced . Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Rhino This model is equipped with: combi-bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Land Raider This model is equipped with: 2 soulshatter lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Scuttling Horrors
unit.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, this unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

composition.description: 2 Chaos Spawn Every model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

unit.name: Lethal Obsession
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , each time this unit is selected to shoot, if it makes one or more ranged attacks and all of those attacks target the same enemy unit, until the end of the turn, each time this unit declares a charge , if that enemy unit is a target of that charge, you can re-roll the Charge roll .

composition.description: 1 Terminator Champion 4 Chaos Terminators Every model is equipped with: combi-bolter; accursed weapon.

unit.name: Soporific Musk
unit.description: Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability Falls Back , models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests . When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked , subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

composition.description: 1 Blissbringer 2-5 Fiends Every model is equipped with: barbed tail and dissecting claws.

unit.name: Daemonic Patrons
unit.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, it can call upon daemonic patrons. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, an unmodified Wound roll of 3+ scores a Critical Wound . At the end of the Fight phase , if this unit called upon daemonic patrons this phase and no enemy models were destroyed by attacks made by models in this unit this phase, one model in this unit is destroyed.

composition.description: 3-6 Flawless Blades Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; blissblade.

unit.name: Airborne Predator
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit that it moved over during that move and roll two D6, adding 1 to each result if that enemy unit can FLY : for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds .

composition.description: 1 Heldrake This model is equipped with: Hades autocannon; Heldrake claws.

unit.name: Glutton for Punishment
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack, if it is below its Starting Strength , add 1 to the Hit roll . If this model is also Below Half-strength , add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

composition.description: 1 Maulerfiend This model is equipped with: lasher tendrils; Maulerfiend fists.

unit.name: Terrifying Crescendo
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 1 from that test.

composition.description: 1 Disharmonist 5 Noise Marines Every model is equipped with: sonic blaster; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Unholy Speed
unit.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

unit.name: Daemonic Icon
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

unit.name: Instrument of Chaos
unit.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

composition.description: 1 Heartseeker 4-9 Seekers Every model is equipped with: lashing tongue; slashing claws.
